1.0.1.name: wordpress/haikuo-goods-list-info
1.0.1.description: "海阔淘宝客插件"是海阔的核心产品, 根据文章里的关键字，自动匹配推荐相关淘宝客商品，并显示在每篇文章的下方，与一般的淘宝客插件最大的区别是我们的插件可以根据发布文章的内容，合理的进行文章数据挖掘，展示出与文章内容最匹配的淘宝客商品，不需要人工做过多的设置，从而大幅提高淘宝客的转换率，为博主创造更多收入。 | The plugin is the sea wide of core products, according to the article's keywords, automatically matching Recommended related Taobao off merchandise, and displayed in each article below, and the general Taobao off plug the biggest difference is our plug-in can release the contents of the article, data mining and reasonable for the article, demonstrating the best match with the contents of the article Taobao off goods, does not require manual setting to do too much, resulting in improved customer conversion rate of Taobao, the main B
